changeSet.id: Add index to global inclusion queries
changeSet.author: Binh Vu
changeSet.comment: Add index to properties that are used by global inclusion.
changeSet.sql: CREATE CONSTRAINT constraint_***ARANGO_DB_NAME***_name IF NOT EXISTS ON (n:db_Lifelike) ASSERT n.name IS UNIQUE; CREATE INDEX index_***ARANGO_DB_NAME***_id IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:db_Lifelike) ON (n.eid)
